body: 2 months later and still my stomach hurts knowing the fact that Tama anthologies didn't learn their lesson overdoing the censorship, can they just do black bar censorship like the rest of the antologies out there? Look at Otokonoko Heaven their stuff may not be as premium as Tama, but the fact that they do censorship better means they have more people enjoying their stuff!
3 months later and I still find the censorship to be outrageous like nigga what's even the point of posting this when you're just gonna ruin it with overcensorship anyways.
It'd be better if they weren't crossdressing
请问一下，怎么投稿的啊？
